tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    customer_location VARCHAR(255),
    customer_age INT,
    customer_preferences VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    preference VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_communication (
    communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    location_id UUID REFERENCES locations(location_id),
    group_id UUID REFERENCES age_groups(group_id),
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    age INT,
    location STRING,
    preferences STRING
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_messages (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_title STRING,
    message_content STRING,
    segment_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES location_segments(segment_id)
);
